info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:23PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Light snow, rain, and freezing rain expected late tonight through Tuesday morning... A passing weather system will bring light snow, rain, and some freezing rain to the Milk River Valley and adjacent areas late tonight into Tuesday morning. Snowfall amounts will generally range from a dusting to a half inch. Any ice accumulation should be limited to a couple hundredths of an inch or less. Those with travel plans later tonight and on Tuesday morning should be alert for changing driving conditions and are urged to slow down in anticipation of slippery roads from ice and snow. A glaze of ice may accumulate on sidewalks and other surfaces, creating difficult walking conditions for pedestrians.
